name: Not Very Pro Wrestling
description:
-------------------------------------------------
 NOT VERY PRO WRESTLING
-------------------------------------------------

 Alex FC       (code)
 Dotto Meister (art)

 Music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
       Licensed under Creative Commons
       Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

 Made for 8 Bits to Infinity ~ 2 Button Jam
-------------------------------------------------
 CONTROLS

 * Left arrow               = Move left
 * Right arrow              = Move Right
 * Left arrow + Right arrow = Jump
-------------------------------------------------
 RULES

 Push the enemy off the island in a
 three-out-of-five series
